message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I think this is a good starting point.
I think it's fair for us to split the money evenly, considering we both have an equal chance of making the final proposal. What do you think?
Not so fast, Bob! You're trying to get a better deal now that you've seen my proposal. I'm not buying it. I'll make a new offer.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more considering the inflation. This is my best offer so far.
